# Slice indexer

Gets the [`SliceKey`](../SliceKey.md) element from this [`Slice`](../Slice.md) at the specified index.

```csharp
public SliceKey this[int index] { get; }
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| index | The index of the [`SliceKey`](../SliceKey.md) in this slice. |

## Return Value

The [`SliceKey`](../SliceKey.md) at the specified index.
